title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: Observed Behavior is that the current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 uses Class.forName() for Callback instantiation.
EB: Callback instantiation in BidiUtil should be done directly without using Class.forName().
SR:
Change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
Note: This change hasn't been tested, but it is expected to produce the same result.
